briefTitle: T-DXd in the First-Line Treatment of Locally Advanced or Metastatic TNBC-LAR HER2-low Patients
officialTitle: An Open-label, Single-arm Phase II Trial of First-line Treatment With Trastuzumab Deruxtecan for Patients With Locally Advanced or Metastatic Triple-Negative Breast Cancer, Luminal Androgen Receptor Subtype With Low Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 (HER2) Expression.
